dquick.item.graphic_item



class GraphicItem: dquick.item.declarative_item.DeclarativeItem;
Interface for items that can be renderer or have some geometrical properties

void setSize(Vector2f32 size);
Have to be called only on rootItem by window

@property float implicitWidth();
Return the natural width of the GraphicItem The default implicit width for most items is float.nan, however some items have an inherent implicit width which cannot be overridden, e.g. Image, Text.

@property float implicitHeight();
Return the natural height of the GraphicItem The default implicit height for most items is float.nan, however some items have an inherent implicit height which cannot be overridden, e.g. Image, Text.

@property void clip(bool flag);
Put it to true to clip parts of item that are out of his rectangle (determined by his size) It's implemented with a scissor, so don't use it with rotations

@property void scale(float value);
Change the scale factor, tranformation origin is the center of item

@property void orientation(float value);
Change the orientation angle in degrees clockwise, tranformation origin is the center of item
